Class NetworkImage

    This class draw on a GraphicsContext the Network.

    • Method Detail

      • peekNearest

        public static Object peekNearest(double w,
                                 double h,
                                 double x,
                                 double y,
                                 Network net)
        Get the nearest node or link to the mouse cursor position.
        Parameters:
        w - Canvas width.
        h - Canvas height.
        x - Mouse x position.
        y - Mouse y position.
        net - Epanet network.
        Returns:
        reference to the nearest element or null if there isn't a selected.

      • drawNetwork

        public static void drawNetwork(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                               double w,
                               double h,
                               Network net,
                               Object selected)
        Render the network in the canvas and draw a marker on selected element.

        The selected object can be a element that is not showed in the canvas, i.e., is not a node or link, so it method does not mark the selected item.

        Parameters:
        gc - Reference to the canvas graphics.
        w - Canvas width.
        h - Canvas height.
        net - Epanet network.
        selected - Reference to the selected element of the network. null if there isn't a selected item.

      • drawLegend

        public static void drawLegend(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                              double width,
                              double height)
        Draw legends
        Parameters:
        gc - the graphics context
        width - the width of window
        height - the height of window
